channel.title: [PI] Spirite help
channel.description:
OKAY so i fixed my spirite problem but for osme reason when i pm someone the owner and donator both have the same symbol. So if i make it the owner symbol both donators AND owners can pm and it shows up the owner symbol. if you know what i mean
In regualr chat the symbolz are correct just pming people though its messed up
